item.description:
I've always wanted to see one of 'Up with Peoples' shows, and they are coming to the Lowell Auditorium on August 17th at 7pm.

I thought if we could meet outside at around 6:15, we may be able to get some seats together.Â  I'll get more details, on when they open the door.

Here's the flyer...

Buy tickets ahead, send money to:

Susan Tisbert

PO BOX 793, Pelham, NH 03076

At the door price is $25

Sent to me ahead, no later than August 10th:

$20 adults

$15 Students, Seniors and Children

or go all out and pay $75 for Patron seating which includes reception & VIP Seating)
item.how_to_find_us: I'd like to meet outside at 6:15 and find a bunch of seats together...
item.name: Up With People coming to Lowell Auditorium
